document_data.name: Elliot
document_data.mainbody:
'''Elliot''' was a member of [[The Guild]] and a bodyguard of its elected bursar in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''If it's [[Uktar (The Guild)|Uktar]] you're after, he's in with the guildmaster. Not even [[Nine-Fingers Keene]] can escape the great balancing of Guild books.''|Elliot}}
document_data.Description: Snapbone was a [[half-orc]] man with a dirty-olive-green hide. He had brown hair gathered in a bun. He wore a [[leather armor]] dyed in [[emerald]]-green â€“ the Guild's telltale colors and was armed with a [[longbow]] and a [[dagger]]
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, [[Snapbone]], along with Elliot, was placed to guard the Guild's elected bursar, the masked man only known as Uktar. He continued to serve the bursar and the Guild through the [[Absolute crisis]] and the conflict with the dreaded [[Stone Lord]], a new kingpin who secretly served the [[Absolute]].
